bibl.title: Pharaonic Alexandria: Ezekhiel's 'Exagogé' and Political Allegory in Hellenistic Judaism. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Argues that Ezekhiel's 'Exagogé' is an allegorical commentary of Hellenistic Alexandria and of the life of the Jewish community in Alexandria.

bibl.title: The Space of the City in Graeco-Roman Egypt. Image and Reality.

bibl.seg: Whitmarsh Tim, Pharaonic Alexandria: Ezekhiel's 'Exagogé' and Political Allegory in Hellenistic Judaism. Avec résumé en anglais.
Eva Subías, Pedro Azara, Jesús Carruesco, Ignacio Fiz and Rosa Cuesta (Edd.), The Space of the City in Graeco-Roman Egypt. Image and Reality = Documenta. 22 (Tarragona, 2011) pp. 41-48; - 219-220.
Argues that Ezekhiel's 'Exagogé' is an allegorical commentary of Hellenistic Alexandria and of the life of the Jewish community in Alexandria.
